Name: scylla_cdc_operations_with_preimage_failed
Description: number of failed operations that included preimage

Name: scrape_duration_seconds
Description: Duration of the scrape

Name: scrape_samples_post_metric_relabeling
Description: The number of samples remaining after metric relabeling was applied

Name: scrape_samples_scraped
Description: The number of samples the target exposed

Name: scrape_series_added
Description: The approximate number of new series in this scrape

Name: scylla_alien_receive_batch_queue_length
Description: Current receive batch queue length

Name: scylla_alien_total_received_messages
Description: Total number of received messages

Name: scylla_alien_total_sent_messages
Description: Total number of sent messages

Name: scylla_batchlog_manager_total_write_replay_attempts
Description: Counts write operations issued in a batchlog replay flow. The high value of this metric indicates that we have a long batch replay list.

Name: scylla_cache_active_reads
Description: number of currently active reads

Name: scylla_cache_bytes_total
Description: total size of memory for the cache

Name: scylla_cache_bytes_used
Description: current bytes used by the cache out of the total size of memory

Name: scylla_cache_concurrent_misses_same_key
Description: total number of operation with misses same key

Name: scylla_cache_dummy_row_hits
Description: total number of dummy rows touched by reads in cache

Name: scylla_cache_mispopulations
Description: number of entries not inserted by reads

Name: scylla_cache_partition_evictions
Description: total number of evicted partitions

Name: scylla_cache_partition_hits
Description: number of partitions needed by reads and found in cache

Name: scylla_cache_partition_insertions
Description: total number of partitions added to cache

Name: scylla_cache_partition_merges
Description: total number of partitions merged

Name: scylla_cache_partition_misses
Description: number of partitions needed by reads and missing in cache

Name: scylla_cache_partition_removals
Description: total number of invalidated partitions

Name: scylla_cache_partitions
Description: total number of cached partitions

Name: scylla_cache_pinned_dirty_memory_overload
Description: amount of pinned bytes that we tried to unpin over the limit. This should sit constantly at 0, and any number different than 0 is indicative of a bug

Name: scylla_cache_range_tombstone_reads
Description: total amount of range tombstones processed during read

Name: scylla_cache_reads
Description: number of started reads

Name: scylla_cache_reads_with_misses
Description: number of reads which had to read from sstables

Name: scylla_cache_row_evictions
Description: total number of rows evicted from cache

Name: scylla_cache_row_hits
Description: total number of rows needed by reads and found in cache

Name: scylla_cache_row_insertions
Description: total number of rows added to cache

Name: scylla_cache_row_misses
Description: total number of rows needed by reads and missing in cache

Name: scylla_cache_row_removals
Description: total number of invalidated rows

Name: scylla_cache_row_tombstone_reads
Description: total amount of row tombstones processed during read

Name: scylla_cache_rows
Description: total number of cached rows

Name: scylla_cache_rows_compacted_with_tombstones
Description: Number of rows scanned during write of a tombstone for the purpose of compaction in cache

Name: scylla_cache_rows_dropped_by_tombstones
Description: Number of rows dropped in cache by a tombstone write

Name: scylla_cache_rows_dropped_from_memtable
Description: total number of rows in memtables which were dropped during cache update on memtable flush

Name: scylla_cache_rows_merged_from_memtable
Description: total number of rows in memtables which were merged with existing rows during cache update on memtable flush

Name: scylla_cache_rows_processed_from_memtable
Description: total number of rows in memtables which were processed during cache update on memtable flush

Name: scylla_cache_sstable_partition_skips
Description: number of times sstable reader was fast forwarded across partitions

Name: scylla_cache_sstable_reader_recreations
Description: number of times sstable reader was recreated due to memtable flush

Name: scylla_cache_sstable_row_skips
Description: number of times sstable reader was fast forwarded within a partition

Name: scylla_cache_static_row_insertions
Description: total number of static rows added to cache

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_clustering_row_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a clustering_row

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_clustering_row_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a clustering_row

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_list_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a list

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_list_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a list

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_map_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a map

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_map_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a map

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_partition_delete_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a partition_delete

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_partition_delete_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a partition_delete

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_range_tombstone_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a range_tombstone

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_range_tombstone_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a range_tombstone

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_row_delete_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a row_delete

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_row_delete_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a row_delete

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_set_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a set

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_set_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a set

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_static_row_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a static_row

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_static_row_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a static_row

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_udt_performed_failed
Description: number of failed CDC operations that processed a udt

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_on_udt_performed_total
Description: number of total CDC operations that processed a udt

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_total
Description: number of total CDC operations

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_with_postimage_failed
Description: number of failed operations that included postimage

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_with_postimage_total
Description: number of total operations that included postimage

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_with_preimage_failed
Description: number of failed operations that included preimage

Name: scylla_cdc_operations_with_preimage_total
Description: number of total operations that included preimage

Name: scylla_cdc_preimage_selects_failed
Description: number of failed preimage queries performed

Name: scylla_cdc_preimage_selects_total
Description: number of total preimage queries performed

Name: scylla_commitlog_active_allocations
Description: Current number of active allocations.

Name: scylla_commitlog_alloc
Description: Counts number of times a new mutation has been added to a segment. Divide bytes_written by this value to get the average number of bytes per mutation written to the disk.

Name: scylla_commitlog_allocating_segments
Description: Holds the number of not closed segments that still have some free space. This value should not get too high.

Name: scylla_commitlog_blocked_on_new_segment
Description: Number of allocations blocked on acquiring new segment.

Name: scylla_commitlog_bytes_flush_requested
Description: Counts number of bytes requested to be flushed (persisted).

Name: scylla_commitlog_bytes_released
Description: Counts number of bytes released from disk. (Deleted/recycled)

Name: scylla_commitlog_bytes_written
Description: Counts number of bytes written to the disk. Divide this value by alloc" to get the average number of bytes per mutation written to the disk."

Name: scylla_commitlog_cycle
Description: Counts number of commitlog write cycles - when the data is written from the internal memory buffer to the disk.

Name: scylla_commitlog_disk_active_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes used for data so far. A too high value indicates that we have some bottleneck in the writing to sstables path.

Name: scylla_commitlog_disk_slack_end_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes unused because of segment switching (end slack). A too high value indicates that we do not write enough data to each segment.

Name: scylla_commitlog_disk_total_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes reserved for data so far. A too high value indicates that we have some bottleneck in the writing to sstables path.

Name: scylla_commitlog_flush
Description: Counts number of times the flush() method was called for a file.

Name: scylla_commitlog_flush_limit_exceeded
Description: Counts number of times a flush limit was exceeded. A non-zero value indicates that there are too many pending flush operations (see pending_flushes) and some of them will be blocked till the total amount of pending flush operations drops below 5.

Name: scylla_commitlog_memory_buffer_bytes
Description: Holds the total number of bytes in internal memory buffers.

Name: scylla_commitlog_pending_allocations
Description: Holds number of currently pending allocations. A non-zero value indicates that we have a bottleneck in the disk write flow.

Name: scylla_commitlog_pending_flushes
Description: Holds number of currently pending flushes. See the related flush_limit_exceeded metric.

Name: scylla_commitlog_requests_blocked_memory
Description: Counts number of requests blocked due to memory pressure. A non-zero value indicates that the commitlog memory quota is not enough to serve the required amount of requests.

Name: scylla_commitlog_segments
Description: Holds the current number of segments.

Name: scylla_commitlog_slack
Description: Counts number of unused bytes written to the disk due to disk segment alignment.

Name: scylla_commitlog_unused_segments
Description: Holds the current number of unused segments. A non-zero value indicates that the disk write path became temporary slow.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_backlog
Description: Holds the sum of compaction backlog for all tables in the system.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_compactions
Description: Holds the number of currently active compactions.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_completed_compactions
Description: Holds the number of completed compaction tasks.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_failed_compactions
Description: Holds the number of failed compaction tasks.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_normalized_backlog
Description: Holds the sum of normalized compaction backlog for all tables in the system. Backlog is normalized by dividing backlog by shard's available memory.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_pending_compactions
Description: Holds the number of compaction tasks waiting for an opportunity to run.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_postponed_compactions
Description: Holds the number of tables with postponed compaction.

Name: scylla_compaction_manager_validation_errors
Description: Holds the number of encountered validation errors.

Name: scylla_cql_authorized_prepared_statements_cache_evictions
Description: Counts the number of authenticated prepared statements cache entries evictions.

Name: scylla_cql_authorized_prepared_statements_cache_size
Description: Number of entries in the authenticated prepared statements cache.

Name: scylla_cql_authorized_prepared_statements_unprivileged_entries_evictions_on_size
Description: Counts a number of evictions of prepared statements from the authorized prepared statements cache after they have been used only once. An increasing counter suggests the user may be preparing a different statement for each request instead of reusing the same prepared statement with parameters.

Name: scylla_cql_batches
Description: Counts the total number of CQL BATCH requests without conditions.

Name: scylla_cql_batches_pure_logged
Description: Counts the total number of LOGGED batches that were executed as LOGGED batches.

Name: scylla_cql_batches_pure_unlogged
Description: Counts the total number of UNLOGGED batches that were executed as UNLOGGED batches.

Name: scylla_cql_batches_unlogged_from_logged
Description: Counts the total number of LOGGED batches that were executed as UNLOGGED batches.

Name: scylla_cql_deletes
Description: Counts the total number of CQL DELETE requests with/without conditions.

Name: scylla_cql_deletes_per_ks
Description: Counts the number of CQL DELETE requests executed on particular keyspaces. Label `who' indicates where the reqs come from (clients or DB internals)

Name: scylla_cql_filtered_read_requests
Description: Counts the total number of CQL read requests that required ALLOW FILTERING. See filtered_rows_read_total to compare how many rows needed to be filtered.

Name: scylla_cql_filtered_rows_dropped_total
Description: Counts the number of rows read during CQL requests that required ALLOW FILTERING and dropped by the filter. Number similar to filtered_rows_read_total indicates that filtering is not accurate and might cause performance degradation.

Name: scylla_cql_filtered_rows_matched_total
Description: Counts the number of rows read during CQL requests that required ALLOW FILTERING and accepted by the filter. Number similar to filtered_rows_read_total indicates that filtering is accurate.

Name: scylla_cql_filtered_rows_read_total
Description: Counts the total number of rows read during CQL requests that required ALLOW FILTERING. See filtered_rows_matched_total and filtered_rows_dropped_total for information how accurate filtering queries are.

Name: scylla_cql_inserts
Description: Counts the total number of CQL INSERT requests with/without conditions.

Name: scylla_cql_inserts_per_ks
Description: Counts the number of CQL INSERT requests executed on particular keyspaces. Label `who' indicates where the reqs come from (clients or DB internals).

Name: scylla_cql_prepared_cache_evictions
Description: Counts the number of prepared statements cache entries evictions.

Name: scylla_cql_prepared_cache_memory_footprint
Description: Size (in bytes) of the prepared statements cache.

Name: scylla_cql_prepared_cache_size
Description: A number of entries in the prepared statements cache.

Name: scylla_cql_reads
Description: Counts the total number of CQL SELECT requests.

Name: scylla_cql_reads_per_ks
Description: Counts the number of CQL SELECT requests executed on particular keyspaces. Label `who' indicates where the reqs come from (clients or DB internals)

Name: scylla_cql_reverse_queries
Description: Counts the number of CQL SELECT requests with reverse ORDER BY order.

Name: scylla_cql_rows_read
Description: Counts the total number of rows read during CQL requests.

Name: scylla_cql_secondary_index_creates
Description: Counts the total number of CQL CREATE INDEX requests.

Name: scylla_cql_secondary_index_drops
Description: Counts the total number of CQL DROP INDEX requests.

Name: scylla_cql_secondary_index_reads
Description: Counts the total number of CQL read requests performed using secondary indexes.

Name: scylla_cql_secondary_index_rows_read
Description: Counts the total number of rows read during CQL requests performed using secondary indexes.

Name: scylla_cql_select_allow_filtering
Description: Counts the number of SELECT query executions with ALLOW FILTERING option.

Name: scylla_cql_select_bypass_caches
Description: Counts the number of SELECT query executions with BYPASS CACHE option.

Name: scylla_cql_select_parallelized
Description: Counts the number of parallelized aggregation SELECT query executions.

Name: scylla_cql_select_partition_range_scan
Description: Counts the number of SELECT query executions requiring partition range scan.

Name: scylla_cql_select_partition_range_scan_no_bypass_cache
Description: Counts the number of SELECT query executions requiring partition range scan without BYPASS CACHE option.

Name: scylla_cql_statements_in_batches
Description: Counts the total number of sub-statements in CQL BATCH requests without conditions.

Name: scylla_cql_unpaged_select_queries
Description: Counts the total number of unpaged CQL SELECT requests.

Name: scylla_cql_unpaged_select_queries_per_ks
Description: Counts the number of unpaged CQL SELECT requests against particular keyspaces.

Name: scylla_cql_unprivileged_entries_evictions_on_size
Description: Counts a number of evictions of prepared statements from the prepared statements cache after they have been used only once. An increasing counter suggests the user may be preparing a different statement for each request instead of reusing the same prepared statement with parameters.

Name: scylla_cql_updates
Description: Counts the total number of CQL UPDATE requests with/without conditions.

Name: scylla_cql_updates_per_ks
Description: Counts the number of CQL UPDATE requests executed on particular keyspaces. Label `who' indicates where the reqs come from (clients or DB internals)

Name: scylla_cql_user_prepared_auth_cache_footprint
Description: Size (in bytes) of the authenticated prepared statements cache.

Name: scylla_database_active_reads
Description: Holds the number of currently active read operations.

Name: scylla_database_clustering_filter_count
Description: Counts bloom filter invocations.

Name: scylla_database_clustering_filter_fast_path_count
Description: Counts number of times bloom filtering short cut to include all sstables when only one full range was specified.

Name: scylla_database_clustering_filter_sstables_checked
Description: Counts sstables checked after applying the bloom filter. High value indicates that bloom filter is not very efficient.

Name: scylla_database_clustering_filter_surviving_sstables
Description: Counts sstables that survived the clustering key filtering. High value indicates that bloom filter is not very efficient and still have to access a lot of sstables to get data.

Name: scylla_database_counter_cell_lock_acquisition
Description: The number of acquired counter cell locks.

Name: scylla_database_counter_cell_lock_pending
Description: The number of counter updates waiting for a lock.

Name: scylla_database_disk_reads
Description: Holds the number of currently active disk read operations.

Name: scylla_database_dropped_view_updates
Description: Counts the number of view updates that have been dropped due to cluster overload.

Name: scylla_database_large_partition_exceeding_threshold
Description: Number of large partitions exceeding compaction_large_partition_warning_threshold_mb. Large partitions have performance impact and should be avoided, check the documentation for details.

Name: scylla_database_multishard_query_failed_reader_saves
Description: The number of times the saving of a shard reader failed.

Name: scylla_database_multishard_query_failed_reader_stops
Description: The number of times the stopping of a shard reader failed.

Name: scylla_database_multishard_query_unpopped_bytes
Description: The total number of bytes that were extracted from the shard reader but were unconsumed by the query and moved back into the reader.

Name: scylla_database_multishard_query_unpopped_fragments
Description: The total number of fragments that were extracted from the shard reader but were unconsumed by the query and moved back into the reader.

Name: scylla_database_paused_reads
Description: The number of currently active reads that are temporarily paused.

Name: scylla_database_paused_reads_permit_based_evictions
Description: The number of paused reads evicted to free up permits. Permits are required for new reads to start, and the database will evict paused reads (if any) to be able to admit new ones, if there is a shortage of permits.

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_drops
Description: Counts querier cache lookups that found a cached querier but had to drop it due to position mismatch

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_lookups
Description: Counts querier cache lookups (paging queries)

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_misses
Description: Counts querier cache lookups that failed to find a cached querier

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_population
Description: The number of entries currently in the querier cache.

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_resource_based_evictions
Description: Counts querier cache entries that were evicted to free up resources (limited by reader concurency limits) necessary to create new readers.

Name: scylla_database_querier_cache_time_based_evictions
Description: Counts querier cache entries that timed out and were evicted.

Name: scylla_database_queued_reads
Description: Holds the number of currently queued read operations.

Name: scylla_database_reads_memory_consumption
Description: Holds the amount of memory consumed by current read operations.

Name: scylla_database_reads_shed_due_to_overload
Description: The number of reads shed because the admission queue reached its max capacity. When the queue is full, excessive reads are shed to avoid overload.

Name: scylla_database_requests_blocked_memory
Description: Holds the current number of requests blocked due to reaching the memory quota (945291264B). Non-zero value indicates that our bottleneck is memory and more specifically - the memory quota allocated for the database" component."

Name: scylla_database_requests_blocked_memory_current
Description: Holds the current number of requests blocked due to reaching the memory quota (945291264B). Non-zero value indicates that our bottleneck is memory and more specifically - the memory quota allocated for the database" component."

Name: scylla_database_schema_changed
Description: The number of times the schema changed

Name: scylla_database_short_data_queries
Description: The rate of data queries (data or digest reads) that returned less rows than requested due to result size limiting.

Name: scylla_database_short_mutation_queries
Description: The rate of mutation queries that returned less rows than requested due to result size limiting.

Name: scylla_database_sstable_read_queue_overloads
Description: Counts the number of times the sstable read queue was overloaded. A non-zero value indicates that we have to drop read requests because they arrive faster than we can serve them.

Name: scylla_database_sstables_read
Description: Holds the number of currently read sstables.

Name: scylla_database_total_reads
Description: Counts the total number of successful user reads on this shard.

Name: scylla_database_total_reads_failed
Description: Counts the total number of failed user read operations. Add the total_reads to this value to get the total amount of reads issued on this shard.

Name: scylla_database_total_reads_rate_limited
Description: Counts read operations which were rejected on the replica side because the per-partition limit was reached.

Name: scylla_database_total_result_bytes
Description: Holds the current amount of memory used for results.

Name: scylla_database_total_view_updates_failed_local
Description: Total number of view updates generated for tables and failed to be applied locally.

Name: scylla_database_total_view_updates_failed_remote
Description: Total number of view updates generated for tables and failed to be sent to remote replicas.

Name: scylla_database_total_view_updates_pushed_local
Description: Total number of view updates generated for tables and applied locally.

Name: scylla_database_total_view_updates_pushed_remote
Description: Total number of view updates generated for tables and sent to remote replicas.

Name: scylla_database_total_writes
Description: Counts the total number of successful write operations performed by this shard.

Name: scylla_database_total_writes_failed
Description: Counts the total number of failed write operations. A sum of this value plus total_writes represents a total amount of writes attempted on this shard.

Name: scylla_database_total_writes_rate_limited
Description: Counts write operations which were rejected on the replica side because the per-partition limit was reached.

Name: scylla_database_total_writes_timedout
Description: Counts write operations failed due to a timeout. A positive value is a sign of storage being overloaded.

Name: scylla_database_view_building_paused
Description: Counts the number of times view building process was paused (e.g. due to node unavailability).

Name: scylla_database_view_update_backlog
Description: Holds the current size in bytes of the pending view updates for all tables

Name: scylla_execution_stages_function_calls_enqueued
Description: Counts function calls added to execution stages queues

Name: scylla_execution_stages_function_calls_executed
Description: Counts function calls executed by execution stages

Name: scylla_execution_stages_tasks_preempted
Description: Counts tasks which were preempted before execution all queued operations

Name: scylla_execution_stages_tasks_scheduled
Description: Counts tasks scheduled by execution stages

Name: scylla_forward_service_requests_dispatched_to_other_nodes
Description: how many forward requests were dispatched to other nodes

Name: scylla_forward_service_requests_dispatched_to_own_shards
Description: how many forward requests were dispatched to local shards

Name: scylla_forward_service_requests_executed
Description: how many forward requests were executed

Name: scylla_gossip_heart_beat
Description: Heartbeat of the current Node.

Name: scylla_gossip_live
Description: How many live nodes the current node sees

Name: scylla_gossip_unreachable
Description: How many unreachable nodes the current node sees

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_corrupted_files
Description: Number of hints files that were discarded during sending because the file was corrupted.

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_discarded
Description: Number of hints that were discarded during sending (too old, schema changed, etc.).

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_dropped
Description: Number of dropped hints.

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_errors
Description: Number of errors during hints writes.

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_pending_drains
Description: Number of tasks waiting in the queue for draining hints

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_pending_sends
Description: Number of tasks waiting in the queue for sending a hint

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_sent
Description: Number of sent hints.

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_size_of_hints_in_progress
Description: Size of hinted mutations that are scheduled to be written.

Name: scylla_hints_for_views_manager_written
Description: Number of successfully written hints.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_corrupted_files
Description: Number of hints files that were discarded during sending because the file was corrupted.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_discarded
Description: Number of hints that were discarded during sending (too old, schema changed, etc.).

Name: scylla_hints_manager_dropped
Description: Number of dropped hints.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_errors
Description: Number of errors during hints writes.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_pending_drains
Description: Number of tasks waiting in the queue for draining hints

Name: scylla_hints_manager_pending_sends
Description: Number of tasks waiting in the queue for sending a hint

Name: scylla_hints_manager_sent
Description: Number of sent hints.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_size_of_hints_in_progress
Description: Size of hinted mutations that are scheduled to be written.

Name: scylla_hints_manager_written
Description: Number of successfully written hints.

Name: scylla_httpd_connections_current
Description: The current number of open  connections

Name: scylla_httpd_connections_total
Description: The total number of connections opened

Name: scylla_httpd_read_errors
Description: The total number of errors while reading http requests

Name: scylla_httpd_reply_errors
Description: The total number of errors while replying to http

Name: scylla_httpd_requests_served
Description: The total number of http requests served

Name: scylla_io_queue_adjusted_consumption
Description: Consumed disk capacity units adjusted for class shares and idling preemption

Name: scylla_io_queue_consumption
Description: Accumulated disk capacity units consumed by this class; an increment per-second rate indicates full utilization

Name: scylla_io_queue_delay
Description: random delay time in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_disk_queue_length
Description: Number of requests in the disk

Name: scylla_io_queue_queue_length
Description: Number of requests in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_shares
Description: current amount of shares

Name: scylla_io_queue_starvation_time_sec
Description: Total time spent starving for disk

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_bytes
Description: Total bytes passed in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_delay_sec
Description: Total time spent in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_exec_sec
Description: Total time spent in disk

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_operations
Description: Total operations passed in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_read_bytes
Description: Total read bytes passed in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_read_ops
Description: Total read operations passed in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_split_bytes
Description: Total number of bytes split

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_split_ops
Description: Total number of requests split

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_write_bytes
Description: Total write bytes passed in the queue

Name: scylla_io_queue_total_write_ops
Description: Total write operations passed in the queue

Name: scylla_lsa_free_space
Description: Holds a current amount of free memory that is under lsa control.

Name: scylla_lsa_large_objects_total_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current size of allocated non-LSA memory.

Name: scylla_lsa_memory_allocated
Description: Counts number of bytes which were requested from LSA.

Name: scylla_lsa_memory_compacted
Description: Counts number of bytes which were copied as part of segment compaction.

Name: scylla_lsa_memory_evicted
Description: Counts number of bytes which were evicted.

Name: scylla_lsa_memory_freed
Description: Counts number of bytes which were requested to be freed in LSA.

Name: scylla_lsa_non_lsa_used_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current amount of used non-LSA memory.

Name: scylla_lsa_occupancy
Description: Holds a current portion (in percents) of the used memory.

Name: scylla_lsa_segments_compacted
Description: Counts a number of compacted segments.

Name: scylla_lsa_small_objects_total_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current size of small objects" memory region in bytes."

Name: scylla_lsa_small_objects_used_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current amount of used small objects" memory in bytes."

Name: scylla_lsa_total_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current size of allocated memory in bytes.

Name: scylla_lsa_used_space_bytes
Description: Holds a current amount of used memory in bytes.

Name: scylla_memory_allocated_memory
Description: Allocated memory size in bytes

Name: scylla_memory_cross_cpu_free_operations
Description: Total number of cross cpu free

Name: scylla_memory_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the current size of all (regular"

Name: scylla_memory_free_memory
Description: Free memory size in bytes

Name: scylla_memory_free_operations
Description: Total number of free operations

Name: scylla_memory_malloc_failed
Description: Total count of failed memory allocations

Name: scylla_memory_malloc_live_objects
Description: Number of live objects

Name: scylla_memory_malloc_operations
Description: Total number of malloc operations

Name: scylla_memory_reclaims_operations
Description: Total reclaims operations

Name: scylla_memory_regular_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the current size of a all non-free memory in bytes

Name: scylla_memory_regular_unspooled_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the size of used memory in bytes. Compare it to dirty_bytes" to see how many memory is wasted (neither used nor available)."

Name: scylla_memory_system_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the current size of a all non-free memory in bytes

Name: scylla_memory_system_unspooled_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the size of used memory in bytes. Compare it to dirty_bytes" to see how many memory is wasted (neither used nor available)."

Name: scylla_memory_total_memory
Description: Total memory size in bytes

Name: scylla_memory_unspooled_dirty_bytes
Description: Holds the size of all (regular"
Unit: "system" and "streaming") used memory in bytes. Compare it to "dirty_bytes" to see how many memory is wasted (neither used nor available)."

Name: scylla_memtables_failed_flushes
Description: Holds the number of failed memtable flushes. High value in this metric may indicate a permanent failure to flush a memtable.

Name: scylla_memtables_pending_flushes
Description: Holds the current number of memtables that are currently being flushed to sstables. High value in this metric may be an indication of storage being a bottleneck.

Name: scylla_memtables_pending_flushes_bytes
Description: Holds the current number of bytes in memtables that are currently being flushed to sstables. High value in this metric may be an indication of storage being a bottleneck.

Name: scylla_node_operation_mode
Description: The operation mode of the current node. UNKNOWN = 0, STARTING = 1, JOINING = 2, NORMAL = 3, LEAVING = 4, DECOMMISSIONED = 5, DRAINING = 6, DRAINED = 7, MOVING = 8

Name: scylla_node_ops_finished_percentage
Description: Finished percentage of node operation on this shard

Name: scylla_per_partition_rate_limiter_allocations
Description: Number of times a entry was allocated over an empty/expired entry.

Name: scylla_per_partition_rate_limiter_failed_allocations
Description: Number of times the rate limiter gave up trying to allocate.

Name: scylla_per_partition_rate_limiter_load_factor
Description: Current load factor of the hash table (upper bound, may be overestimated).

Name: scylla_per_partition_rate_limiter_probe_count
Description: Number of probes made during lookups.

Name: scylla_per_partition_rate_limiter_successful_lookups
Description: Number of times a lookup returned an already allocated entry.

Name: scylla_query_processor_queries
Description: Counts queries by consistency level.

Name: scylla_query_processor_statements_prepared
Description: Counts the total number of parsed CQL requests.

Name: scylla_raft_add_entries
Description: how many entries were added on this node

Name: scylla_raft_applied_entries
Description: how many log entries were applied

Name: scylla_raft_group0_status
Description: status of the raft group, 0 - disabled, 1 - normal, 2 - aborted

Name: scylla_raft_in_memory_log_size
Description: size of in-memory part of the log

Name: scylla_raft_log_memory_usage
Description: memory usage of in-memory part of the log in bytes

Name: scylla_raft_messages_received
Description: how many messages were received

Name: scylla_raft_messages_sent
Description: how many messages were send

Name: scylla_raft_persisted_log_entries
Description: how many log entries were persisted

Name: scylla_raft_polls
Description: how many time raft state machine was polled

Name: scylla_raft_queue_entries_for_apply
Description: how many log entries were queued to be applied

Name: scylla_raft_sm_load_snapshot
Description: how many times user state machine was reloaded with a snapshot

Name: scylla_raft_snapshots_taken
Description: how many time the user's state machine was snapshotted

Name: scylla_raft_store_snapshot
Description: how many snapshot were persisted

Name: scylla_raft_store_term_and_vote
Description: how many times term and vote were persisted

Name: scylla_raft_truncate_persisted_log
Description: how many times log was truncated on storage

Name: scylla_raft_waiter_awoken
Description: how many waiters got result back

Name: scylla_raft_waiter_dropped
Description: how many waiters did not get result back

Name: scylla_reactor_abandoned_failed_futures
Description: Total number of abandoned failed futures, futures destroyed while still containing an exception

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_bytes_read
Description: Total aio-reads bytes

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_bytes_write
Description: Total aio-writes bytes

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_errors
Description: Total aio errors

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_outsizes
Description: Total number of aio operations that exceed IO limit

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_reads
Description: Total aio-reads operations

Name: scylla_reactor_aio_writes
Description: Total aio-writes operations

Name: scylla_reactor_cpp_exceptions
Description: Total number of C++ exceptions

Name: scylla_reactor_cpu_busy_ms
Description: Total cpu busy time in milliseconds

Name: scylla_reactor_cpu_steal_time_ms
Description: Total steal time, the time in which some other process was running while Seastar was not trying to run (not sleeping).Because this is in userspace, some time that could be legitimally thought as steal time is not accounted as such. For example, if we are sleeping and can wake up but the kernel hasn't woken us up yet.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_read_bytes
Description: Counts bytes read from disk file streams.  A high rate indicates high disk activity. Divide by fstream_reads to determine average read size.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_read_bytes_blocked
Description: Counts the number of bytes read from disk that could not be satisfied from read-ahead buffers, and had to block. Indicates short streams, or incorrect read ahead configuration.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_reads
Description: Counts reads from disk file streams.  A high rate indicates high disk activity. Contrast with other fstream_read* counters to locate bottlenecks.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_reads_ahead_bytes_discarded
Description: Counts the number of buffered bytes that were read ahead of time and were discarded because they were not needed, wasting disk bandwidth. Indicates over-eager read ahead configuration.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_reads_aheads_discarded
Description: Counts the number of times a buffer that was read ahead of time and was discarded because it was not needed, wasting disk bandwidth. Indicates over-eager read ahead configuration.

Name: scylla_reactor_fstream_reads_blocked
Description: Counts the number of times a disk read could not be satisfied from read-ahead buffers, and had to block. Indicates short streams, or incorrect read ahead configuration.

Name: scylla_reactor_fsyncs
Description: Total number of fsync operations

Name: scylla_reactor_io_threaded_fallbacks
Description: Total number of io-threaded-fallbacks operations

Name: scylla_reactor_logging_failures
Description: Total number of logging failures

Name: scylla_reactor_polls
Description: Number of times pollers were executed

Name: scylla_reactor_tasks_pending
Description: Number of pending tasks in the queue

Name: scylla_reactor_tasks_processed
Description: Total tasks processed

Name: scylla_reactor_timers_pending
Description: Number of tasks in the timer-pending queue

Name: scylla_reactor_utilization
Description: CPU utilization

Name: scylla_scheduler_queue_length
Description: Size of backlog on this queue, in tasks; indicates whether the queue is busy and/or contended

Name: scylla_scheduler_runtime_ms
Description: Accumulated runtime of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates full utilization

Name: scylla_scheduler_shares
Description: Shares allocated to this queue

Name: scylla_scheduler_starvetime_ms
Description: Accumulated starvation time of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates the scheduler feels really bad

Name: scylla_scheduler_tasks_processed
Description: Count of tasks executing on this queue; indicates together with runtime_ms indicates length of tasks

Name: scylla_scheduler_time_spent_on_task_quota_violations_ms
Description: Total amount in milliseconds we were in violation of the task quota

Name: scylla_scheduler_waittime_ms
Description: Accumulated waittime of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates queue is waiting for something (e.g. IO)

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_active_allocations
Description: Current number of active allocations.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_alloc
Description: Counts number of times a new mutation has been added to a segment. Divide bytes_written by this value to get the average number of bytes per mutation written to the disk.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_allocating_segments
Description: Holds the number of not closed segments that still have some free space. This value should not get too high.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_blocked_on_new_segment
Description: Number of allocations blocked on acquiring new segment.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_bytes_flush_requested
Description: Counts number of bytes requested to be flushed (persisted).

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_bytes_released
Description: Counts number of bytes released from disk. (Deleted/recycled)

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_bytes_written
Description: Counts number of bytes written to the disk. Divide this value by alloc" to get the average number of bytes per mutation written to the disk."

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_cycle
Description: Counts number of commitlog write cycles - when the data is written from the internal memory buffer to the disk.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_disk_active_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes used for data so far. A too high value indicates that we have some bottleneck in the writing to sstables path.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_disk_slack_end_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes unused because of segment switching (end slack). A too high value indicates that we do not write enough data to each segment.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_disk_total_bytes
Description: Holds size of disk space in bytes reserved for data so far. A too high value indicates that we have some bottleneck in the writing to sstables path.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_flush
Description: Counts number of times the flush() method was called for a file.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_flush_limit_exceeded
Description: Counts number of times a flush limit was exceeded. A non-zero value indicates that there are too many pending flush operations (see pending_flushes) and some of them will be blocked till the total amount of pending flush operations drops below 5.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_memory_buffer_bytes
Description: Holds the total number of bytes in internal memory buffers.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_pending_allocations
Description: Holds number of currently pending allocations. A non-zero value indicates that we have a bottleneck in the disk write flow.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_pending_flushes
Description: Holds number of currently pending flushes. See the related flush_limit_exceeded metric.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_requests_blocked_memory
Description: Counts number of requests blocked due to memory pressure. A non-zero value indicates that the commitlog memory quota is not enough to serve the required amount of requests.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_segments
Description: Holds the current number of segments.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_slack
Description: Counts number of unused bytes written to the disk due to disk segment alignment.

Name: scylla_schema_commitlog_unused_segments
Description: Holds the current number of unused segments. A non-zero value indicates that the disk write path became temporary slow.

Name: scylla_scylladb_current_version
Description: Current ScyllaDB version.

Name: scylla_sstables_bloom_filter_memory_size
Description: Bloom filter memory usage in bytes.

Name: scylla_sstables_capped_local_deletion_time
Description: Was local deletion time capped at maximum allowed value in Statistics

Name: scylla_sstables_capped_tombstone_deletion_time
Description: Was partition tombstone deletion time capped at maximum allowed value

Name: scylla_sstables_cell_tombstone_writes
Description: Number of cell tombstones written

Name: scylla_sstables_cell_writes
Description: Number of cells written

Name: scylla_sstables_currently_open_for_reading
Description: Number of sstables currently open for reading

Name: scylla_sstables_currently_open_for_writing
Description: Number of sstables currently open for writing

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_blocks
Description: Index page requests which needed to wait due to page not being loaded yet

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_bytes
Description: Total number of bytes cached in the index page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_bytes_in_std
Description: Total number of bytes in temporary buffers which live in the std allocator

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_evictions
Description: Total number of index page cache pages which have been evicted

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_hits
Description: Index page cache requests which were served from cache

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_misses
Description: Index page cache requests which had to perform I/O

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_cache_populations
Description: Total number of index page cache pages which were inserted into the cache

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_evictions
Description: Index pages which got evicted from memory

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_hits
Description: Index page requests which could be satisfied without waiting

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_misses
Description: Index page requests which initiated a read from disk

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_populations
Description: Index pages which got populated into memory

Name: scylla_sstables_index_page_used_bytes
Description: Amount of bytes used by index pages in memory

Name: scylla_sstables_partition_reads
Description: Number of partitions read

Name: scylla_sstables_partition_seeks
Description: Number of partitions seeked

Name: scylla_sstables_partition_writes
Description: Number of partitions written

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_auto_scale_events
Description: Number of promoted index auto-scaling events

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_block_count
Description: Number of promoted index blocks currently cached

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_bytes
Description: Number of bytes currently used by cached promoted index blocks

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_evictions
Description: Number of promoted index blocks which got evicted

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_hits_l0
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l0 which didn't have to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_hits_l1
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l1 which didn't have to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_hits_l2
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l2 which didn't have to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_misses_l0
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l0 which had to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_misses_l1
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l1 which had to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_misses_l2
Description: Number of requests for promoted index block in state l2 which had to go to the page cache

Name: scylla_sstables_pi_cache_populations
Description: Number of promoted index blocks which got inserted

Name: scylla_sstables_range_partition_reads
Description: Number of partition range flat mutation reads

Name: scylla_sstables_range_tombstone_reads
Description: Number of range tombstones read

Name: scylla_sstables_range_tombstone_writes
Description: Number of range tombstones written

Name: scylla_sstables_row_reads
Description: Number of rows read

Name: scylla_sstables_row_tombstone_reads
Description: Number of row tombstones read

Name: scylla_sstables_row_writes
Description: Number of clustering rows written

Name: scylla_sstables_single_partition_reads
Description: Number of single partition flat mutation reads

Name: scylla_sstables_static_row_writes
Description: Number of static rows written

Name: scylla_sstables_tombstone_writes
Description: Number of tombstones written

Name: scylla_sstables_total_deleted
Description: Counter of deleted sstables

Name: scylla_sstables_total_open_for_reading
Description: Counter of sstables open for reading

Name: scylla_sstables_total_open_for_writing
Description: Counter of sstables open for writing

Name: scylla_stall_detector_reported
Description: Total number of reported stalls, look in the traces for the exact reason

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_background_reads
Description: number of currently pending background read requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_background_replica_writes_failed_local_node
Description: number of replica writes that timed out or failed after CL was reachedon a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_background_writes
Description: number of currently pending background write requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_cas_background
Description: how many paxos operations are still running after a result was alredy returned

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_cas_foreground
Description: how many paxos operations that did not yet produce a result are running

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_cas_prune
Description: how many times paxos prune was done after successful cas operation

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_completed_reads_local_node
Description: number of data read requests that completedon a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_current_throttled_base_writes
Description: number of currently throttled base replica write requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_current_throttled_writes
Description: number of currently throttled write requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_foreground_reads
Description: number of currently pending foreground read requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_foreground_writes
Description: number of currently pending foreground write requests

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_last_mv_flow_control_delay
Description: delay (in seconds) added for MV flow control in the last request

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_errors_local_node
Description: number of data read requests that failedon a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_latency
Description: The general read latency histogram

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_latency_summary
Description: Read latency summary

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_repair_write_attempts_local_node
Description: number of write operations in a read repair contexton a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_reads_local_node
Description: number of data read requestson a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_total_write_attempts_local_node
Description: total number of write requestson a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_errors_local_node
Description: number of write requests that failedon a local Node

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency
Description: The general write latency histogram

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_summary
Description: Write latency summary

Name: scylla_storage_proxy_replica_cross_shard_ops
Description: number of operations that crossed a shard boundary

Name: scylla_streaming_finished_percentage
Description: Finished percentage of node operation on this shard

Name: scylla_streaming_total_incoming_bytes
Description: Total number of bytes received on this shard.

Name: scylla_streaming_total_outgoing_bytes
Description: Total number of bytes sent on this shard.

Name: scylla_tracing_active_sessions
Description: Holds a number of a currently active tracing sessions.

Name: scylla_tracing_cached_records
Description: Holds a number of tracing records cached in the tracing sessions that are not going to be written in the next write event. If sum of this metric, pending_for_write_records and flushing_records is close to 11000 we are likely to start dropping tracing records.

Name: scylla_tracing_dropped_records
Description: Counts a number of dropped records due to too many pending records. High value indicates that backend is saturated with the rate with which new tracing records are created.

Name: scylla_tracing_dropped_sessions
Description: Counts a number of dropped sessions due to too many pending sessions/records. High value indicates that backend is saturated with the rate with which new tracing records are created.

Name: scylla_tracing_flushing_records
Description: Holds a number of tracing records that currently being written to the I/O backend. If sum of this metric, cached_records and pending_for_write_records is close to 11000 we are likely to start dropping tracing records.

Name: scylla_tracing_keyspace_helper_bad_column_family_errors
Description: Counts a number of times write failed due to one of the tables in the system_traces keyspace has an incompatible schema. One error may result one or more tracing records to be lost. Non-zero value indicates that the administrator has to take immediate steps to fix the corresponding schema. The appropriate error message will be printed in the syslog.

Name: scylla_tracing_keyspace_helper_tracing_errors
Description: Counts a number of errors during writing to a system_traces keyspace. One error may cause one or more tracing records to be lost.

Name: scylla_tracing_pending_for_write_records
Description: Holds a number of tracing records that are going to be written in the next write event. If sum of this metric, cached_records and flushing_records is close to 11000 we are likely to start dropping tracing records.

Name: scylla_tracing_trace_errors
Description: Counts a number of trace records dropped due to an error (e.g. OOM).

Name: scylla_tracing_trace_records_count
Description: This metric is a rate of tracing records generation.

Name: scylla_transport_auth_responses
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL AUTH messages.

Name: scylla_transport_batch_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL BATCH messages.

Name: scylla_transport_cql_connections
Description: Counts a number of client connections.

Name: scylla_transport_cql_errors_total
Description: Counts the total number of returned CQL errors.

Name: scylla_transport_current_connections
Description: Holds a current number of client connections.

Name: scylla_transport_execute_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL EXECUTE messages.

Name: scylla_transport_options_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL OPTIONS messages.

Name: scylla_transport_prepare_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL PREPARE messages.

Name: scylla_transport_query_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL QUERY messages.

Name: scylla_transport_register_requests
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL REGISTER messages.

Name: scylla_transport_requests_blocked_memory
Description: Holds an incrementing counter with the requests that ever blocked due to reaching the memory quota limit (378116505B). The first derivative of this value shows how often we block due to memory exhaustion in the CQL transport" component."

Name: scylla_transport_requests_blocked_memory_current
Description: Holds the number of requests that are currently blocked due to reaching the memory quota limit (378116505B). Non-zero value indicates that our bottleneck is memory and more specifically - the memory quota allocated for the CQL transport" component."

Name: scylla_transport_requests_memory_available
Description: Holds the amount of available memory for admitting new requests (max is 378116505B).Zero value indicates that our bottleneck is memory and more specifically - the memory quota allocated for the CQL transport" component."

Name: scylla_transport_requests_served
Description: Counts a number of served requests.

Name: scylla_transport_requests_serving
Description: Holds a number of requests that are being processed right now.

Name: scylla_transport_requests_shed
Description: Holds an incrementing counter with the requests that were shed due to overload (threshold configured via max_concurrent_requests_per_shard). The first derivative of this value shows how often we shed requests due to overload in the CQL transport" component."

Name: scylla_transport_startups
Description: Counts the total number of received CQL STARTUP messages.

Name: scylla_view_builder_builds_in_progress
Description: Number of currently active view builds.

Name: scylla_view_builder_pending_bookkeeping_ops
Description: Number of tasks waiting to perform bookkeeping operations

Name: scylla_view_builder_steps_failed
Description: Number of failed build steps.

Name: scylla_view_builder_steps_performed
Description: Number of performed build steps.

Name: scylla_view_update_generator_pending_registrations
Description: Number of tasks waiting to register staging sstables

Name: scylla_view_update_generator_queued_batches_count
Description: Number of sets of sstables queued for view update generation

Name: scylla_view_update_generator_sstables_pending_work
Description: Number of bytes remaining to be processed from SSTables for view updates

Name: scylla_view_update_generator_sstables_to_move_count
Description: Number of sets of sstables which are already processed and wait to be moved from their staging directory

Name: up
Description: The scraping was successful
